title: Educational Integration of Research Data Using Network Meta-Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Analysis and Understanding of General Meta-Analysis Methodology
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education using smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles of network meta-analysis (NMA) and its application procedures in educational research
Interpret NMA simulation results comparing five types of online learning designs
Construct and statistically validate 10 network models for comparing multiple intervention effects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
